For<S>1063</S> the law<S>3551</S> having<S>2192</S> a shadow<S>4639</S> of good things<S>18</S> to come<S>3195</S>, and not<S>3756</S> the very<S>846</S> image<S>1504</S> of the things<S>4229</S>, can<S>1410</S> never<S>3763</S> with those<S>846</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S> which<S>3739</S> they offered<S>4374</S> year by year<S>2596</S> <S>1763</S> continually<S>1519</S> <S>1336</S> make<S>5048</S> the comers thereunto<S>4334</S> perfect<S>5048</S>.
For then<S>1893</S> would they<S>302</S> not<S>3756</S> have ceased<S>3973</S> to be offered<S>4374</S>? because<S>1223</S> that the worshippers<S>3000</S> once<S>530</S> purged<S>2508</S> should have had<S>2192</S> no<S>3367</S> more<S>2089</S> conscience<S>4893</S> of sins<S>266</S>. <sup>would: or, they would have ceased to be offered, because, etc.</sup>
But<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>846</S> sacrifices there is a remembrance again<S>364</S> made of sins<S>266</S> every<S>2596</S> year<S>1763</S>.
For<S>1063</S> it is not possible<S>102</S> that the blood<S>129</S> of bulls<S>5022</S> and<S>2532</S> of goats<S>5131</S> should take away<S>851</S> sins<S>266</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> when he cometh<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>, he saith<S>3004</S>, Sacrifice<S>2378</S> and<S>2532</S> offering<S>4376</S> thou wouldest<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>, but<S>1161</S> a body<S>4983</S> hast thou prepared<S>2675</S> me<S>3427</S>: <sup>hast: or, thou hast fitted me</sup>
In burnt offerings<S>3646</S> and<S>2532</S> sacrifices for<S>4012</S> sin<S>266</S> thou hast had<S>2106</S> no<S>3756</S> pleasure<S>2106</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> said I<S>2036</S>, Lo<S>2400</S>, I come<S>2240</S> (in<S>1722</S> the volume<S>2777</S> of the book<S>975</S> it is written<S>1125</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>,) to do<S>4160</S> thy<S>4675</S> will<S>2307</S>, O God<S>2316</S>.
Above<S>511</S> when he said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> Sacrifice<S>2378</S> and<S>2532</S> offering<S>4376</S> and<S>2532</S> burnt offerings<S>3646</S> and<S>2532</S> offering for<S>4012</S> sin<S>266</S> thou wouldest<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>, neither<S>3761</S> hadst pleasure<S>2106</S> therein; which<S>3748</S> are offered<S>4374</S> by<S>2596</S> the law<S>3551</S>;
Then<S>5119</S> said he<S>2046</S>, Lo<S>2400</S>, I come<S>2240</S> to do<S>4160</S> thy<S>4675</S> will<S>2307</S>, O God<S>2316</S>. He taketh away<S>337</S> the first<S>4413</S>, that<S>2443</S> he may establish<S>2476</S> the second<S>1208</S>.
By<S>1722</S> the which<S>3739</S> will<S>2307</S> we are<S>2070</S> sanctified<S>37</S> through<S>1223</S> the offering<S>4376</S> of the body<S>4983</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> once<S>2178</S> for all.
And<S>2532</S> <S>3303</S> every<S>3956</S> priest<S>2409</S> standeth<S>2476</S> daily<S>2596</S> <S>2250</S> ministering<S>3008</S> and<S>2532</S> offering<S>4374</S> oftentimes<S>4178</S> the same<S>846</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S>, which<S>3748</S> can<S>1410</S> never<S>3763</S> take away<S>4014</S> sins<S>266</S>:
But<S>1161</S> this man<S>846</S>, after he had offered<S>4374</S> one<S>3391</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S> for<S>5228</S> sins<S>266</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>1336</S>, sat down<S>2523</S> on<S>1722</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of God<S>2316</S>;
From henceforth<S>3063</S> expecting<S>1551</S> till<S>2193</S> his<S>846</S> enemies<S>2190</S> be made<S>5087</S> his<S>846</S> footstool<S>5286</S> <S>4228</S>.
For<S>1063</S> by one<S>3391</S> offering<S>4376</S> he hath perfected<S>5048</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>1336</S> them that are sanctified<S>37</S>.
Whereof <S>1161</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> also<S>2532</S> is a witness<S>3140</S> to us<S>2254</S>: for<S>1063</S> after<S>3326</S> that he had said before<S>4280</S>,
This<S>3778</S> is the covenant<S>1242</S> that<S>3739</S> I will make<S>1303</S> with<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S> after<S>3326</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, I will put<S>1325</S> my<S>3450</S> laws<S>3551</S> into<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> minds<S>1271</S> will I write<S>1924</S> them<S>846</S>;
And<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> sins<S>266</S> and<S>2532</S> iniquities<S>458</S> <S>846</S> will I remember<S>3415</S> no<S>3364</S> more<S>2089</S>. <sup>And their: some copies have, Then he said, And their</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> where<S>3699</S> remission<S>859</S> of these<S>5130</S> is, there is no more<S>3765</S> offering<S>4376</S> for<S>4012</S> sin<S>266</S>.
Having<S>2192</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, boldness<S>3954</S> to<S>1519</S> enter<S>1529</S> into the holiest<S>39</S> by<S>1722</S> the blood<S>129</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>, <sup>boldness: or, liberty</sup>
By a new<S>4372</S> and<S>2532</S> living<S>2198</S> way<S>3598</S>, which<S>3739</S> he hath consecrated<S>1457</S> for us<S>2254</S>, through<S>1223</S> the veil<S>2665</S>, that is to say<S>5123</S>, his<S>846</S> flesh<S>4561</S>; <sup>consecrated: or, new made</sup>
And<S>2532</S> having an high<S>3173</S> priest<S>2409</S> over<S>1909</S> the house<S>3624</S> of God<S>2316</S>;
Let us draw near<S>4334</S> with<S>3326</S> a true<S>228</S> heart<S>2588</S> in<S>1722</S> full assurance<S>4136</S> of faith<S>4102</S>, having<S>4472</S> our hearts<S>2588</S> sprinkled<S>4472</S> from<S>575</S> an evil<S>4190</S> conscience<S>4893</S>, and<S>2532</S> our bodies<S>4983</S> washed<S>3068</S> with pure<S>2513</S> water<S>5204</S>.
Let us hold fast<S>2722</S> the profession<S>3671</S> of our faith<S>1680</S> without wavering<S>186</S>; (for<S>1063</S> he is faithful<S>4103</S> that promised<S>1861</S>;)
And<S>2532</S> let us consider<S>2657</S> one another<S>240</S> to<S>1519</S> provoke<S>3948</S> unto love<S>26</S> and<S>2532</S> to good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S>:
Not<S>3361</S> forsaking<S>1459</S> the assembling<S>1997</S> of ourselves<S>1438</S> together<S>1997</S>, as<S>2531</S> the manner<S>1485</S> of some<S>5100</S> is; but<S>235</S> exhorting<S>3870</S> one another: and<S>2532</S> so much<S>5118</S> the more<S>3123</S>, as<S>3745</S> ye see<S>991</S> the day<S>2250</S> approaching<S>1448</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if we<S>2257</S> sin<S>264</S> wilfully<S>1596</S> after<S>3326</S> that we have received<S>2983</S> the knowledge<S>1922</S> of the truth<S>225</S>, there remaineth<S>620</S> no more<S>3765</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S> for<S>4012</S> sins<S>266</S>,
But<S>1161</S> a certain<S>5100</S> fearful<S>5398</S> looking for<S>1561</S> of judgment<S>2920</S> and<S>2532</S> fiery<S>4442</S> indignation<S>2205</S>, which shall<S>3195</S> devour<S>2068</S> the adversaries<S>5227</S>.
He<S>5100</S> that despised<S>114</S> Moses'<S>3475</S> law<S>3551</S> died<S>599</S> without<S>5565</S> mercy<S>3628</S> under<S>1909</S> two<S>1417</S> or<S>2228</S> three<S>5140</S> witnesses<S>3144</S>:
Of how much<S>4214</S> sorer<S>5501</S> punishment<S>5098</S>, suppose ye<S>1380</S>, shall he be thought worthy<S>515</S>, who<S>3588</S> hath trodden under foot<S>2662</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath counted<S>2233</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the covenant<S>1242</S>, wherewith<S>3739</S> <S>1722</S> he was sanctified<S>37</S>, an unholy thing<S>2839</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath done despite<S>1796</S> unto the Spirit<S>4151</S> of grace<S>5485</S>?
For<S>1063</S> we know<S>1492</S> him that hath said<S>2036</S>, Vengeance<S>1557</S> belongeth unto me<S>1698</S>, I<S>1473</S> will recompense<S>467</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, The Lord<S>2962</S> shall judge<S>2919</S> his<S>846</S> people<S>2992</S>.
It is a fearful thing<S>5398</S> to fall<S>1706</S> into<S>1519</S> the hands<S>5495</S> of the living<S>2198</S> God<S>2316</S>.
But<S>1161</S> call to remembrance<S>363</S> the former<S>4386</S> days<S>2250</S>, in<S>1722</S> which<S>3739</S>, after ye were illuminated<S>5461</S>, ye endured<S>5278</S> a great<S>4183</S> fight<S>119</S> of afflictions<S>3804</S>;
Partly<S>5124</S> <S>3303</S>, whilst ye were made a gazingstock<S>2301</S> both<S>5037</S> by reproaches<S>3680</S> and<S>2532</S> afflictions<S>2347</S>; and<S>1161</S> partly<S>5124</S>, whilst ye became<S>1096</S> companions<S>2844</S> of them that were<S>390</S> so<S>3779</S> used<S>390</S>.
For<S>2532</S> <S>1063</S> ye had compassion<S>4834</S> of me in my<S>3450</S> bonds<S>1199</S>, and<S>2532</S> took<S>4327</S> joyfully<S>3326</S> <S>5479</S> the spoiling<S>724</S> of your<S>5216</S> goods<S>5224</S>, knowing<S>1097</S> in<S>1722</S> yourselves<S>1438</S> that ye have<S>2192</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> a better<S>2909</S> and<S>2532</S> an enduring<S>3306</S> substance<S>5223</S>.
Cast<S>577</S> not<S>3361</S> away<S>577</S> therefore<S>3767</S> your<S>5216</S> confidence<S>3954</S>, which<S>3748</S> hath<S>2192</S> great<S>3173</S> recompence of reward<S>3405</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye have<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S> of patience<S>5281</S>, that<S>2443</S>, after ye have done<S>4160</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>, ye might receive<S>2865</S> the promise<S>1860</S>.
For<S>1063</S> yet<S>2089</S> a little<S>3397</S> while<S>3745</S> <S>3745</S>, and he that shall come<S>2064</S> will come<S>2240</S>, and<S>2532</S> will<S>5549</S> not<S>3756</S> tarry<S>5549</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the just<S>1342</S> shall live<S>2198</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>: but<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> any man draw back<S>5288</S>, my<S>3450</S> soul<S>5590</S> shall have<S>2106</S> no<S>3756</S> pleasure<S>2106</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> we<S>2249</S> are<S>2070</S> not<S>3756</S> of them who draw back<S>5289</S> unto<S>1519</S> perdition<S>684</S>; but<S>235</S> of them that believe<S>4102</S> to<S>1519</S> the saving<S>4047</S> of the soul<S>5590</S>.
